executable.title: Growing Registration
executable.contributor: Vinicius Boen and Mason Winsauer, Neuro Image Resarch and Analysis Laboratory, UNC Medical School, UofM School Of Dentistry
executable.acknowledgements: A collaborative effort with Dr. Martin Styner, Dr. Beatriz Paniagua and Dr. Lucia Cevidanes

image.name: fixedMaskVolume
image.label: Baseline Mask
image.description: Grayscale image masked at the chosen part (time 0).

image.name: movingMaskVolume
image.label: Follow Up Mask
image.description: Grayscale image masked at the chosen part (time 1).

parameters.label: Registration Phases (Check one or more, executed in order listed)
parameters.description: Each of the registration phases will be used to initialize the next phase

boolean.name: useAffine
boolean.label: Affine(12 DOF)
boolean.description: Perform an Affine registration as part of the sequential registration steps. This family of options superceeds the use of transformType if any of them are set.

boolean.name: useScaleSkewVersor3D
boolean.label: Rigid+Scale+Skew(10 DOF)
boolean.description: Perform a ScaleSkewVersor3D registration as part of the sequential registration steps. This family of options superceeds the use of transformType if any of them are set.

transform.name: transformPath
transform.label: Output Transform
transform.description: The estimated transformation output from the registration process.

image.name: segmentation
image.label: Apply Transform to Segmentation
image.description: Apply transformation from registration to an associated segmentation file.
